item.title: Sorrow add a quote by Jarod Kintz

item.title: Sorrow add a quote by John R Lindensmith
item.description: "I alternate between feeling sympathetic toward humanity and being a misanthrope. When I'm sympathetic, it usually means I haven't been around people in awhile." -- John R Lindensmith

item.title: Sorrow add a quote by Gary Klein
item.description: "Biking is about rhythm and flow. It's the wind in you face and the challenge of hammering up along hill. It's the reward at the top and the thrill of a high-speed descent. Biking lets you come alive in both body and spirit. After awhile the bike disappears beneath you and you feel as if you're suspended in midair. " -- Gary Klein
